title: The Planet
description: This project is made to learn the latest three.js features by building a website. I use the scroll function on this website. When you scroll your mouse wheel (in any direction), the planets move in a clockwise direction.

title: Project B

title: Stop-Watch
description: This is a project made to learn how to make functions in javascript and how function work.
